sentences.en: He ate a simple dinner of rice and beans.
sentences.cn: 他晚饭简单地吃了点米饭和豆子。

sentences.en: He cut down on coffee and cigarettes, and ate a balanced diet.
sentences.cn: 他喝咖啡和吸烟都比以前少了，饮食也均衡了。

sentences.en: He nibbled away the apple peel, then ate the flesh.
sentences.cn: 他先慢慢地咬去苹果皮，然后再吃果肉。

sentences.en: He took a spoonful of the stew and ate it.
Livy ate the pasties greedily and with huge enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 莉薇津津有味地大口吃着点心。

sentences.en: Most of the time we just ate snacks and fast food.
sentences.cn: 多数时候我们只吃点心和快餐。

sentences.en: Rachel raved about the new foods she ate while she was there.
sentences.cn: 雷切尔对她在那里吃的新奇食物赞不绝口。

sentences.en: Ray and I ate our meal and reminisced about the trip.
sentences.cn: 雷和我吃着饭，回忆起那次旅行。

sentences.en: She ate two boxes of liqueurs.
sentences.cn: 她吃了两盒酒心巧克力。

sentences.en: The boy ate several dishfuls of ice cream.
sentences.cn: 那小男孩吃了好几满盘冰淇淋。

sentences.en: The volunteers kept a record of everything they ate for a week.
sentences.cn: 志愿者记录下他们一周所吃的所有食物。

sentences.en: They ate, as they usually did, in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 像平常一样，他们是在厨房吃的饭。

sentences.en: They cut the cake in two and ate half each.
sentences.cn: 他们把蛋糕分成两块，每人吃半块。

sentences.en: We ate chips every night, but hardly ever had fish.
sentences.cn: 我们每晚吃炸薯条，但基本从不吃鱼。

sentences.en: We ate in the restaurant, as opposed to the bistro.
sentences.cn: 我们是在餐厅吃的饭，而不是在小饭馆。

sentences.en: We ate lunch together a few times.
sentences.cn: 我们一起吃过几次午餐。

sentences.en: Well-dressed clients were talking in polite undertones as they ate.
sentences.cn: 衣着光鲜的顾客们边吃边斯文地低声聊着天。

phrases.tran_cn: 侵蚀；痛快地吃，尽情地吃
丢脸；被迫收回自己说的话
上馆子吃饭；锈坏；使腐烂
健康首选；吃得营养；吃的好；胃口好
即食食品；速煮食品；方便食品

trans.tran_cn: Automatic Test Equipment 自动试验设备
